sn12.33:1.3: tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn12.33:1.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn12.33:2.2: Jaramarane nanam, jaramaranasamudaye nanam, jaramarananirodhe nanam, jaramarananirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam;
sn12.33:2.3: jatiya nanam, jatisamudaye nanam, jatinirodhe nanam, jatinirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam;
sn12.33:2.4: bhave nanam, bhavasamudaye nanam, bhavanirodhe nanam, bhavanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam;
sn12.33:2.5: upadane nanam, upadanasamudaye nanam, upadananirodhe nanam, upadananirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam;
sn12.33:2.6: tanhaya nanam, tanhasamudaye nanam, tanhanirodhe nanam, tanhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam;
sn12.33:2.7: vedanaya nanam, vedanasamudaye nanam, vedananirodhe nanam, vedananirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam;
sn12.33:2.12: sankharesu nanam, sankharasamudaye nanam, sankharanirodhe nanam, sankharanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam.
sn12.33:3.2: Ya tesam tesam sattanam tamhi tamhi sattanikaye jara jiranata khandiccam paliccam valittacata ayuno samhani indriyanam paripako,
sn12.33:3.4: Ya tesam tesam sattanam tamha tamha sattanikaya cuti cavanata bhedo antaradhanam maccu maranam kalakiriya khandhanam bhedo kalevarassa nikkhepo.
sn12.33:4.3: ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo jaramarananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn12.33:5.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam jaramaranam pajanati, evam jaramaranasamudayam pajanati, evam jaramarananirodham pajanati, evam jaramarananirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, idamassa dhamme nanam.
sn12.33:5.2: So imina dhammena ditthena viditena akalikena pattena pariyogalhena atitanagate nayam neti.
sn12.33:6.1: Ye kho keci atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va jaramaranam abbhannamsu, jaramaranasamudayam abbhannamsu, jaramarananirodham abbhannamsu, jaramarananirodhagaminim patipadam abbhannamsu, sabbete evameva abbhannamsu, seyyathapaham etarahi.
sn12.33:7.1: Yepi hi keci anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va jaramaranam abhijanissanti, jaramaranasamudayam abhijanissanti, jaramarananirodham abhijanissanti, jaramarananirodhagaminim patipadam abhijanissanti, sabbete evameva abhijanissanti, seyyathapaham etarahiti.
sn12.33:8.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imani dve nanani parisuddhani honti pariyodatani—
sn12.33:8.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ditthisampanno itipi, dassanasampanno itipi, agato imam saddhammam itipi, passati imam saddhammam itipi, sekkhena nanena samannagato itipi, sekkhaya vijjaya samannagato itipi, dhammasotam samapanno itipi, ariyo nibbedhikapanno itipi, amatadvaram ahacca titthati itipiti.
sn12.33:10.3: ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo sankharanirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn12.33:11.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako evam sankhare pajanati, evam sankharasamudayam pajanati, evam sankharanirodham pajanati, evam sankharanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati, idamassa dhamme nanam.
sn12.33:11.2: So imina dhammena ditthena viditena akalikena pattena pariyogalhena atitanagate nayam neti.
sn12.33:12.1: Ye kho keci atitamaddhanam samana va brahmana va sankhare abbhannamsu, sankharasamudayam abbhannamsu, sankharanirodham abbhannamsu, sankharanirodhagaminim patipadam abbhannamsu, sabbete evameva abbhannamsu, seyyathapaham etarahi.
sn12.33:13.1: Ye hipi keci anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va sankhare abhijanissanti, sankharasamudayam abhijanissanti, sankharanirodham abhijanissanti, sankharanirodhagaminim patipadam abhijanissanti, sabbete evameva abhijanissanti, seyyathapaham etarahi.
sn12.33:14.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imani dve nanani parisuddhani honti pariyodatani—
sn12.33:14.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ditthisampanno itipi, dassanasampanno itipi, agato imam saddhammam itipi, passati imam saddhammam itipi, sekkhena nanena samannagato itipi, sekkhaya vijjaya samannagato itipi, dhammasotam samapanno itipi, ariyo nibbedhikapanno itipi, amatadvaram ahacca titthati itipi”ti.
